languages.text: "Это правда. Большинство грешников невозможно исправить, лишь поработить или убить. Как тебя".
languages.translation_comment: Jae: "The Imperium is laughably unoriginal in its educational methods. Corrective labour in the mines? Places like this show mercy to no one, adult or child."

languages.text: "It is true. Most malefactors cannot be reformed, only chained or killed, like you."
languages.original_text: "Это правда. Большинство грешников невозможно исправить, лишь поработить или убить. Как тебя".

traits.locale_text: "It is true. Most sinners cannot be reformed, only enslaved or killed, like you."
"It is true. Most sinners cannot be reformed, only enslaved or killed, like you."
"It is true. Most sinners cannot be reformed, only enslaved or killed, like you."
"It is true. Most malefactors cannot be reformed, only chained or killed, like you."
"It is true. Most malefactors cannot be reformed, only chained or killed, like you."

languages.text: "Es ist wahr. Die meisten Übeltäter können nicht reformiert werden, nur an die Kette gelegt oder getötet, genau wie Ihr."
languages.original_text: "It is true. Most malefactors cannot be reformed, only chained or killed, like you."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist wahr. Die meisten Übeltäter können nicht reformiert werden, nur an die Kette gelegt oder getötet, genau wie Ihr."

languages.text: « C'est vrai. La plupart des mécréants ne peuvent être réformés, seulement enchaînés ou exécutés, comme vous. »
languages.original_text: "It is true. Most malefactors cannot be reformed, only chained or killed, like you."

traits.locale_text: « C'est vrai. La plupart des mécréants ne peuvent être réformés, seulement enchaînés ou exécutés, comme vous. »

languages.text: «Es cierto. A la mayoría de malefactores no se les puede reformar. Solo encadenarlos o matarlos, como a ti».
languages.original_text: "It is true. Most malefactors cannot be reformed, only chained or killed, like you."

traits.locale_text: «Es cierto. A la mayoría de malefactores no se les puede reformar. Solo encadenarlos o matarlos, como a ti».

languages.text: 「その通り。 ほとんどの悪人は更生できず、あなたのように鎖につながれるか殺されるだけね」
languages.original_text: "It is true. Most malefactors cannot be reformed, only chained or killed, like you."

traits.locale_text: 「その通り。 ほとんどの悪人は更生できず、あなたのように鎖につながれるか殺されるだけね」

languages.text: “确实如此，绝大多数罪犯根本无法悔过自新，只能锁住或者杀死。比如说，你这样的。”
languages.original_text: "It is true. Most malefactors cannot be reformed, only chained or killed, like you."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此，绝大多数罪犯根本无法悔过自新，只能锁住或者杀死。比如说，你这样的。”

languages.original_text: "It is true. Most malefactors cannot be reformed, only chained or killed, like you."

languages.text: "Doğru. Çoğu caniyi kurtarmak memnun değildir. Tıpkı senin gibi zincire vurulup öldürülmeyi hak ederler."
languages.original_text: "It is true. Most malefactors cannot be reformed, only chained or killed, like you."
